title: Major imbalance between different shard numDocs in SolrCloud on HDFS
description:
I've observed major numDoc imbalance between shards in a collection such as 6k vs 193k docs between the 2 different shards.

See attached screenshots which shows the shards and replicas as well as the core UI output of each of the shard cores taken at the same time.
